SEARCH_MOVE_BY_NAME.title: Move Name
SEARCH_MOVE_BY_NAME.description: Search by the Move name (charm, frenzy plant, ...). You can also use numbers at the start of the text to select the type of move (1charm, 2frenzy plant, ...)

SEARCH_MOVE_BY_TYPE.title: Move Type
SEARCH_MOVE_BY_TYPE.description: Search for moves with a certain type (@fire, @dragon, ...). You can also use numbers at the start of the text to select the type of move (1fire, 2dragon, ...)

SEARCH_MOVE_BY_PVP_BUFFS.title: Buffs
SEARCH_MOVE_BY_PVP_BUFFS.description: Search for moves that have PvP Buffs.
